description: Detects changes to the PowerShell execution policy in order to bypass signing requirements for script execution
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali
name: Potential PowerShell Execution Policy Tampering
query: ((winlog.event_data.EventType:"SetValue" AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(*\\ShellIds\\Microsoft.PowerShell\\ExecutionPolicy OR *\\Policies\\Microsoft\\Windows\\PowerShell\\ExecutionPolicy) AND winlog.event_data.Details:(*Bypass* OR *RemoteSigned* OR *Unrestricted*)) AND (NOT process.executable.text:(C\:\\Windows\\System32\\* OR C\:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\*)))
